title: Welcome to Harry Potter Sorting Hat Quiz

outcomes.name: slytherin
outcomes.message: Congratulations! It appears that you are most likely a member of Slytherin. Dirtbag!

outcomes.name: gryffindor
outcomes.message: Congratulations! It appears that you are most likely a member of Gryffindor. 10 points to Gryffindor!

outcomes.name: hufflepuff
outcomes.message: Congratulations! It appears that you are most likely a member of Hufflepuff. Pansy!

outcomes.name: ravenclaw
outcomes.message: Congratulations! It appears that you are most likely a member of Ravenclaw. Genius!
